::KitKat::

She looked at Gotron. She knew that keeping info from the Allience 
leader wasn't nice, nor would it build trust.  But she didn't want to 
tell the alliance leader that megatron was dead without being 
absolutely sure that Megatron was gone for good. "Gotron, as soon as 
we can make sure that this is Megatron and that he is dead, call your 
leader and let him know. But I don't want to send false news. Please 
under stand this. I want this to be megatron and that he is dead.  
But, I just got to make sure before I tell the Allience that megatron 
is gone for good."

She turned and walked slowly towards the cave. She had to see with 
her own optics that she was rid of her enemy.
